text: As a mom I know that raising children is the hardest job there is.
author: Hilary Rosen

text: I consider my mom and all my sisters my friends.
author: Alexa Vega

text: The best situation is being a single parent. The best part about is that you get time off, too, because the kids are with their mom, so it's the best of both worlds. There's a lot to be said for it.
author: Larry David

text: My mom, Irmelin, taught me the value of life. Her own life was saved by my grandmother during World War II.
author: Leonardo DiCaprio

text: I'm going to let people know that it's cool to have a child and be young and still be a good mom. It's really tough, but I'm doing it.
author: Brandy Norwood
